name: EGBuildALPackage
description: Runs the BC compile script and produces an .app file.
helpMarkDown: Please open a GitHub issue at https://github.com/crazycga/bcdevopsextension/issues for queries or support.
author: Evergrowth Consulting

inputs.name: EntireAppName
inputs.label: Full File Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the app file (without .app), i.e. TestApp.1.1.1 produces TestApp.1.1.1.app

inputs.name: ProjectPath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the AL project folder. Default $(Build.SourcesDirectory)

inputs.name: OutAppFolder
inputs.label: Output App Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path for the compiled .app file.  Default $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)

inputs.name: PackageCachePath
inputs.label: Package Cache Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Package cache path to use during compilation.  Default $(Build.SourcesDirectory)\.alpackages

inputs.name: ALEXEPathFolder
inputs.label: AL.EXE Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the ALC.EXE folder, one folder above.  (The next folder down is 'win32'.)
